storyInfo: The hunter and the prey, the good and the bad, the same and the different; nobody has ever taught Mizuki these things. Perhaps his understandings are no more than his personal view, and perhaps your notions are simply your own wishful thinking.

attributes.text: Those with strength are disposed to be

attributes.content: Perhaps my understanding is flawed, but does the handling method Rhodes Island has chosen fall under the... cooperation you mentioned?
Our liaison was precisely to discuss that, but it seems you've arrived a few hours ahead of schedule.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: I would imagine that even on dry land, arriving earlier than the designated time ought not undermine trust.
And even in Ã†gir, traipsing through the entryway of another's home without so much as a greeting ought not constitute etiquette.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: You remain quite eloquent, but I have no intention of apologizing. Moreover...
Before the Ã†gir's voice reaches, she has already reappeared over ten meters away, standing before the door at corridor's end as if she had been there all along.
Only her voice, left to linger in the hallway, attests to her movement.
She presses her lance lightly against the solitary door, covered in pale blue stickers. Her expression communicates both disgust and indignation, yet her breathing is calm and unperturbed.
Forgive me for asking, but what purpose could compel you to allow a room of this kind, Dame Kal'tsit?
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: As I described in my letter, those living quarters belong to another partner of Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: Do I mishear you? It is my solemn hope that you have not been drawing inspiration from that school of lunatics and their revolting technology.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: Rest assured that we will not attempt to contend with a menace threatening to engulf this land by making use of a different one.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: That is a relief above any other.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: An oblique notch is abruptly slashed into the tough alloy of the doorway, and in one audible movement the Ã†gir's foot elegantly pries it apart into two clean halves.
She disappears through it, sweeps across the room as if searching, and reappears with nothing to show, all in the blink of an eye.
How bizarre. I've somehow managed to mistake the scent of those dregs.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: Or perhaps I should have realized that when you never lifted a finger to stop me, it was not out of acquiescence.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: Setting aside your combat skills, I fear the Abyssal Hunters must also learn to control their emotions when faced with their old enemy.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: Although their present evolution is but the fruit of selective pressures, unguided by intellect, there may always come a day when they reach that milestone.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: Keh. Assume they do. Perhaps, one day, I will indeed try and resist the urge to mangle those filthy beings just long enough to understand their intent.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: Tell me, then. Does Rhodes Island house these things simply to teach me that valuable lesson?
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: I had no intention of playing games with you. My confidence in the Abyssal Hunters' remarkable drive to action simply meant I couldn't let this conversation end before it began.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: And for whose sake does your firm believe my Hunters so carefully and cautiously interact with you all? Keeping far from the landship, daring not to be wounded or shed blood?
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: The information we can obtain from the subject's physiology is worth far more than the brutal death of a single Sea Terror. As a designer of warfare yourself, you should understand this.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: I've transferred the cooperating subject known as 'Mizuki' elsewhere for the time being. I hope we can now have an even-tempered discussion and reach an equally rational conclusion.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.text: Only after leaving the village and encountering a great deal of strangers,
was it slowly realized that individuals drew such a decisive

attributes.content: Several months ago
City of Dossoles, BolÃ­var
Alright, looks like the Singas guys took the bait! Quick, tell our men to follow the plan!
attributes.name: Impatient Mercenary

attributes.content: Uh, got it.
attributes.name: Cowardly Mercenary

attributes.content: When this is all over, our brothers will finally be... truly free!
attributes.name: Impatient Mercenary

attributes.content: The explosion didn't alert Ms. Candela, did it?
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: Reporting in, no. Our informants have been shadowing her the whole time. She's never left the room, and hasn't sent out any instructions.
attributes.name: BolÃ­varian Serviceman A

attributes.content: Excellent. It's still a few hours until sunrise. That's plenty of time for a cover-up.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: We can't let her catch wind of our explosives. The only thing she won't ignore is anything that risks her city plates getting destroyed and scaring the bastards living it up here.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: Have we found out who was responsible for the warehouse yet?
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: Reporting in, it was two mercenaries from True BolÃ­varians.
attributes.name: BolÃ­varian Serviceman B

attributes.content: But we can't link to their comm terminals, and they're not in their hideout. Our guys are on their trail right now.
attributes.name: BolÃ­varian Serviceman B

attributes.content: Any moves from the Singas side? With the Championship coming up, they should be asking Ms. Candela what the hell's going on, after their guys got hurt in an explosion.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: Apparently they're looking for someone. Based on what little we've overheard, they're calling whoever it is 'those kids'.
attributes.name: BolÃ­varian Serviceman B

attributes.content: Wasn't there a Leithanian youth choir staying at a pub near the warehouse recently?
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: Were any of the pub's employees caught in the explosion?
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: Reporting in. We've checked everyone's IDs. Practically all of them were pub security. And simultaneously Singas government soldiers, of course.
attributes.name: BolÃ­varian Serviceman B

attributes.content: Haha, looks like those two mercenaries got both us and the Singas guys good.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: If the Singas people aren't complaining to Ms. Candela, then maybe they were planning to buy the explosives from them...
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: And the True BolÃ­varians side used the deal as a trap to lure in and blow up the Singases in the pub. Taking the opportunity to kidnap the VIPs tooâ€”the 'kids'.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: What? That takes some balls... What's the plan, then?
attributes.name: BolÃ­varian Serviceman B

attributes.content: Prioritize staging it to look like a fire, just your everyday accident. Ms. Candela needs to believe that.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: Maybe if we can find the kids first, we'll have even more room to bargain with the Singases...
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: Reporting in! We just intercepted an anonymous message on its way to the police terminals.
attributes.name: BolÃ­varian Serviceman A

attributes.content: It's got info on True BolÃ­varians kidnapping the Leithanian choir, as well as some coordinates.
attributes.name: BolÃ­varian Serviceman A

attributes.content: Right now we're the only ones with the tip-off. What's our next move?
attributes.name: BolÃ­varian Serviceman A

attributes.content: Wipe all traces of it immediately! We can't let Ms. Candela's people find out.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: The coordinates are probably fake. Don't jump the gun. Just seal all routes out of the city, and focus on making it look like a fire.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: On it!
attributes.name: BolÃ­varian Serviceman A

attributes.content: What the hell's going on...? Who's behind this? Who would it even benefit?
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: ...Who's there?
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: Shoot, he's really sharp. But he'll have to try a little harder if he wants to find me.
Hm... I can't just ignore it when bad guys are doing bad things to children.
Come to think of it, they arrived from Leithanien on the same merchant ship I was on, only a couple days ago. It's like fate, kinda.
I haven't even heard them sing on the big stage yet. Can't waste the ticket I bought.
Tch. How can a pub have so many guards? We dealt with every last one we drew out, and there were still all those guys left.
attributes.name: Impatient Mercenary

attributes.content: But, uh, our brothers more or less dealt with them, so it worked out...
attributes.name: Cowardly Mercenary

attributes.content: Hmph, goddamn Singas tools. Why guard those kids with all those men in the middle of the night?
attributes.name: Impatient Mercenary

attributes.content: It feels like they're... guarding the kids themselves? Or else their people will run? Weird...
attributes.name: Cowardly Mercenary

attributes.content: You might just be onto something. Could really be what's happening.
attributes.name: Impatient Mercenary

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Cowardly Mercenary

attributes.content: Think. None of our brothers actually want to get into this random shit with those True BolÃ­varians, do they? Maybe we're all planning to make a run for it?
attributes.name: Impatient Mercenary

attributes.content: Yeah... Yeah, but I always thought Pancho's ideas made some sense...
attributes.name: Cowardly Mercenary

attributes.content: Hey. Who gives a shit what makes sense? It can be the biggest no-brainer and it's still useless if he can't take the city with it.
attributes.name: Impatient Mercenary

attributes.content: And well, even if he does, all you can do with this city is skim dirty money off the top. It doesn't even have a single proper workyard.
attributes.name: Impatient Mercenary

attributes.content: He wants to fund the BolÃ­varian nation? Without support from the Columbians and Leithanians, I doubt he can fund even a single decent weapon.
attributes.name: Impatient Mercenary

attributes.content: But...
attributes.name: Cowardly Mercenary

attributes.content: No buts. Even if there's a way, it's not for us guys under the hood to figure out.
attributes.name: Impatient Mercenary

attributes.content: Just listen to me, okay? Once this is over, we're all off to live the good life.
attributes.name: Impatient Mercenary

attributes.content: *Sigh*...
What are you sighing for?
attributes.name: Impatient Mercenary

attributes.content: Huh? Did I make a noise?
attributes.name: Cowardly Mercenary

attributes.content: Maybe YOU can go live the good life, but who knows where the children you sold will end up?
Conchetumare, what carajo business is it to you?! Where did you even come from, pendejo? I'll sell you with the rest of 'em!
attributes.name: Impatient Mercenary

attributes.content: Yeek!
attributes.name: Cowardly Mercenary

attributes.content: What're you so scared of?
attributes.name: Impatient Mercenary

attributes.content: My knife... I was gonna slash him, y'know, show some blood to freak him out, but the knife just kinda rolled up!
attributes.name: Cowardly Mercenary

attributes.content: Useless garbage! What'd I just say about these crappy weapons? They wouldn't do shit to a baby.
attributes.name: Impatient Mercenary

attributes.content: Also, watch the kid's skin. Soft and smooth sells. No cutting, just follow my lead...
attributes.name: Impatient Mercenary

attributes.content: Urk...
attributes.name: Impatient Mercenary

attributes.content: Why are you lying down? Let's catch him... guh? The room's tilting! I can't stand!
attributes.name: Cowardly Mercenary

attributes.content: Urgh...
attributes.name: Cowardly Mercenary

attributes.content: Tch. Pendejo. What goddamn evil shit are you? You got cups on your shoes or something? How are you standing on this steep-ass...
attributes.name: Impatient Mercenary

attributes.content: Huh? You're the ones standing crooked to me. Must be why you think everything else is wonky, and you're the only ones standing straight, huh?
Tch! Who sent you? What kinda Leithanian black magic is this? What the hell are you, kid?!
attributes.name: Impatient Mercenary

attributes.options: So, just what is he?;......;Why do we have to be so on guard?

attributes.content: I'm very sorry, Dr. {@nickname}, but I still believe it's not yet time to give you the whole explanation.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: Full elucidation would only serve to add to your current worries, and therefore impact your judgment in many areas.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: Regardless of whether you see yourself as a commander, or as a guide.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.options: Not comprehending also adds to my worries.;Having unknown personnel aboard disturbs my judgment.

attributes.content: Which is why I haven't concealed the Medical Department's plans for, and stance towards, the subject. Moreover, we invited you into this discussion as early as possible.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: As for your proposal to exempt the subject from some of the agreed upon restrictions, you will be briefed on the various risks this poses to you.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: While it may not address all of your doubts, I would still like for you to listen to the staff and I's opinions at the meeting.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: They'll be here soon.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: Our brothers will be here soon! Don't get so full of yourself!
attributes.name: Impatient Mercenary

attributes.content: I wasn't planning to. But I doubt your friends can make it, because they all went lights out before you did. Just like the guy next to you.
But the kids you took should be waking up right about now.
An underground cellar is no place for a dozen children to be sleeping. They should be at home, in bed.
You...!
attributes.name: Impatient Mercenary

attributes.content: Tch, listen to yourself. 'Home'.
attributes.name: Impatient Mercenary

attributes.content: What home, huh? What home are they ever gonna have?
attributes.name: Impatient Mercenary

attributes.content: Like hell a spoiled Leithanian brat who dresses like a freak would know how those kids live!
attributes.name: Impatient Mercenary

attributes.content: Huh? I'm not Leithanian. My name's 'Mizuki'. Even you can tell that sounds Higashinese, right?
Oh, and if we're talking about 'homes', I think I've got a little right to speak, at least.
attributes.name: Mizuki

attributes.content: After all, my home was destroyed by bad guys when I was really young. A bunch of criminal scum who robbed others. Just like you, how about that?
attributes.name: Mizuki

attributes.content: Hff...
attributes.name: Impatient Mercenary

attributes.content: What the hell do you understand, brat? I-It's not like I wasn't trying to help those kids too!
attributes.name: Impatient Mercenary

attributes.content: You don't even know why the Singases sent those kids here!
attributes.name: Impatient Mercenary

attributes.content: So they could perform, duh? Make BolÃ­varians familiar with Leithanian culture?
attributes.name: Mizuki

attributes.content: 'The people here eat, sleep and breathe what the Columbians do, yet all their influence comes from Leithanian culture.'
attributes.name: Mizuki

attributes.content: I've been sick of your True BolÃ­varians pretexts since forever ago.
attributes.name: Mizuki

attributes.content: Heheh, hahahahahah! True BolÃ­varians...
attributes.name: Impatient Mercenary

attributes.content: The people who chose this city never identified with BolÃ­var in the first place. Even if they did, it'd get rubbed outta them sooner or later.
attributes.name: Impatient Mercenary

attributes.content: The people who come here, whether BolÃ­varian, Columbian, or Leithanian, are all here for goddamn son-of-a-bitch money!
attributes.name: Impatient Mercenary

attributes.content: You think they're here to watch Leithanian musicals and poems?
attributes.name: Impatient Mercenary

attributes.content: They're just looking for good performers with nice voices and pretty faces to amuse them at their dinner parties!
attributes.name: Impatient Mercenary

attributes.content: But the Leithanian bastards knew that from the start. They used these kids as goddamn props to make their goddamn deals.
attributes.name: Impatient Mercenary

attributes.content: Guess you've got it all figured out.
attributes.name: Mizuki

attributes.content: I do. How could I not? Our line of business ain't nothing more than fighting in a rich man's world.
attributes.name: Impatient Mercenary

attributes.content: All they gotta do is cough up some cash and we're behind them, babysitting their goddamn pets! Of course we all eventually see through that rotten bullshit.
attributes.name: Impatient Mercenary

attributes.content: And those kids... they're no different.
attributes.name: Impatient Mercenary

attributes.content: Sure, you're both struggling, but you can't deny that you're using them as tools for your own profit too.
attributes.name: Mizuki

attributes.content: And these 'children' weren't using the bigshots of Dossoles either? They never exploited them for any goddamn benefit?!
attributes.name: Impatient Mercenary

attributes.content: Must be nice to still be able to nitpick this stuff while crawling around on the ground. The children never kidnapped anyone to use as chips in their deals.
attributes.name: Mizuki

attributes.content: Wha... What the hell is...? Don't you come any closer!
attributes.name: Impatient Mercenary

attributes.content: Goddamn bastard, why can't I move? You little bitch...
attributes.name: Impatient Mercenary

attributes.content: And bad guys beyond cure, like you, should justâ€”
attributes.name: Mizuki

attributes.content: As described in the meeting, he's already become an entirely different form of life, a type of organism that transforms and reconstructs itself to seek a way forward.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: I assume you understand that life depends on finite resources for survival. Moreover, these organisms must consume vast quantities to achieve their transformations.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: Simply put, they are currently caged by their finite environment, actively reducing their own consumption in order to continue their race. Hibernating beneath the tides.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: But there may come a day when we must compete with them, over all that is required to survive.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: Just as we hunt the vermin that ruin our village stores, so too will we snatch their lives away. Or, perhaps, we will instead become the nutrients stowed in their folds.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: I imagine you've already noticed. Unlike the rest of his kin, the subject has drifted beyond identifying with his race. He has his own thoughts and bewilderments.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: If not, we might not be having this discussion at all.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: These creatures' transformations and evolutions were originally meant to propel their race's development.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: But perhaps the subject cannot truly be called the same. Not the same as one of those lifeforms, nor as you or I.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: Stop it!
attributes.name: Choir Member

attributes.content: He's... He's the same as us!
attributes.name: Choir Member

attributes.content: H-How did you get here?
attributes.name: Impatient Mercenary

attributes.content: ...I planned all of this.
attributes.name: Choir Member

attributes.content: I slipped out a few nights ago, and used my singing to transmit mental suggestions with Originium Arts, getting all the dead-drunk BolÃ­varian mercenaries to take the bait.
attributes.name: Choir Member

attributes.content: The pub's guards were obsessed with buying the explosives thanks to the information I leaked, too.
attributes.name: Choir Member

attributes.content: So, even if I didn't come save you...
attributes.name: Mizuki

attributes.content: I wrote a message for the police ahead of time, set to send by terminal on a timer.
attributes.name: Choir Member

attributes.content: If they try him... then I'm an accomplice.
attributes.name: Choir Member

attributes.content: Tch, stupid little choir kid... You trying to sympathize with me? Is this a joke?
attributes.name: Impatient Mercenary

attributes.content: Man, this is turning into a real headache. I just wanted to get you all back so I wouldn't waste the ticket I ordered for that upcoming music program.
attributes.name: Mizuki

attributes.content: So... in this situation, do you still count as a bad guy, mister?
attributes.name: Mizuki

attributes.content: Heh, cut the bullshit, Leithanian dog. Kill me or whatever, that's up to you.
attributes.name: Impatient Mercenary

attributes.content: But if you Leithanian shits dare touch those kids or snatch them back, then even death ain't gonna stop me from being your worst nightmare!
attributes.name: Impatient Mercenary

attributes.content: I told you, I wasn't sent by the Leithanians.
attributes.name: Mizuki

attributes.content: By now, these people must be fed up with life in this city and all the endless fighting.
attributes.name: Choir Member

attributes.content: I'm so sorry I used them in my own selfish escape plan...
attributes.name: Choir Member

attributes.content: But maybe they're the same as me... We all just want to escape this city, to escape our own homes.
attributes.name: Choir Member

attributes.content: Augh, seriously...?
attributes.name: Mizuki

attributes.content: Fine, I'll back off and stop meddling. Otherwise, I'll start to seem like the bad guy.
attributes.name: Mizuki

attributes.content: But I don't think your plan would've worked without these people's greed.
attributes.name: Mizuki

attributes.content: So just to be safe, I'll let them nap for a little longer, while you guys get away.
attributes.name: Mizuki

attributes.content: I'll be watching him.
attributes.name: Mizuki

attributes.text: but ever since recovering my life, I
But if so, who would be
Who would be truly willing to treat me as

attributes.options: Even if this is all true, I

attributes.content: I have never called your ability into question, Dr. {@nickname}.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: I have complete faith that you can guide his transformation and reconstruction in a direction we would consider 'good'.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: But is it appropriate for us to transform a person like this? Simply because we can? Simply because we maintain that one specific form of survival is the proper one?
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: Is it at all different from altering the subject's personhood in pursuit what we maintain is a finer form of life?
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: This isn't an interrogation, Dr. {@nickname}. I simply want to know if you've ever had the notion that 'our own form of life is superior'.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: This may sound somewhat arrogant, but even possessing choice is often a luxury we don't have, let alone bestowing it.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: But it is indeed an improvement over interfering with others simply because you can.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: Mere interaction necessarily gives rise to interference, even if it is not one's intent. Even if it is not through spoken language.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: When you decided you'd treat the subject as an Operator and communicated with him as such, you were already bound to influence one another.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: That's the answer I most wanted to hear, yet also the one that most concerns me.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: The operators trust, love, and respect you, and entrust their lives to you on missions, all because of your willingness to step forth. Because only you can do that.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: I have not the slightest doubt that you can bear your ever-increasing responsibilities. But there may come a day when they contradict each other, conflict with each other, and drive you to make an unwilling choice.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: However, as you've resolved yourself to do so, I will not stand in your way.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: I often warn the operators you command that, should they approve of you, they ought not harbor too many misgivings about you.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: Not just because it would hinder effectiveness in combat, and numerous other projects. But because for many people, this place is their home.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: Goodbye then, Dr. {@nickname}. Don't keep those who trust you waiting outside for too long.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: Ah...
attributes.name: Mizuki

attributes.content: Doctor, Dr. Kal'tsit said I'd be officially under your command starting today!
attributes.name: Mizuki

attributes.content: It's a pity I still can't be a formal Operator, but as long as you need my help, I'll do whatever I can.
attributes.name: Mizuki

attributes.content: That feels like a kinda half-hearted reply.
attributes.name: Mizuki

attributes.content: Are you still chewing over all that complicated stuff? Or am I just worrying too much?
attributes.name: Mizuki

attributes.content: What's wrong, Doctor? Something on your mind?
attributes.name: Mizuki

attributes.content: Whatever troubles you, you can always talk to me, you know.
attributes.name: Mizuki

attributes.content: Huh? Is that what you want?
attributes.name: Mizuki

attributes.content: I don't really care what status I have, as long as I'm with you.
attributes.name: Mizuki

attributes.content: Speaking of which, you really don't have to worry about me...
attributes.name: Mizuki

attributes.content: I agreed to all of Dr. Kal'tsit's strict limitations to protect both my info and my safety.
attributes.name: Mizuki

attributes.content: Really, Doctor...
attributes.name: Mizuki

attributes.content: We're all responsible for our choices, right?
attributes.name: Mizuki

attributes.content: You may be of the mistaken belief that such an argument would produce some kind of... compassion.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: Of course not.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: Your investigation of dry land will sooner or later require support from dry land. And resisting the underwater enemy may also sooner or later become the task of those on dry land.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: So long as you do not interfere with Rhodes Island's singular foray into this field, I can discuss the terms with you.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: I will exhaust all possibilities in supporting your pursuit of that group's traces on dry land, with our existing intelligence-sharing agreement as the foundation.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: All for the sake of shielding an ignorant individual transformed into an abomination?
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: All for the sake of having another possibility in the future.
attributes.name: Kal
